name: container-hub
tagline: A web interface for browsing and managing Docker registry images
description: Docker Registry UI is a user-friendly interface for browsing and managing Docker images from a registry. It supports search, tags, delete operations, and provides a clean and simple dashboard.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: View all Docker images in your registry at a glance. Clear visual overview

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Browse and compare different image versions easily. Track your releases

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find images quickly with powerful search. Locate what you need fast

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Simple, intuitive interface for registry management. No complexity, just results

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Manage your private Docker registry with ease. Complete control over images
